servinfo.title: Water Pump Inspection

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Water Pump Removal and Installation (For M16 Engine Model):For Petrol Engine Model
Water Pump Removal and Installation (For J20 Engine Model):For Petrol Engine Model

attention2.ptxt: If any repair is required on pump, replace it as assembly.

servinfo.ptxt: Rotate water pump by hand to check for smooth operation. If pump does not rotate smoothly or makes abnormal noise, replace it.
